attributes.action: Scrap Government plans for Personal Details Central Database
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our Personal details should not be kept on a 'central database' where our I.D. will be even easier to steal than it is now! The Government say this is proposed to be 'for security purposes' but if it is really so secure then why is there a 'SEPERATE database prepared only for - Government Members and Top Cellebrities - for secutiry purposes'? If the Government don't trust their personal details to 'The Central Database' then why should we?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
